title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวผมแดงกับจอมเวทอสูร

description.en:
With her mother dead and father long gone, Chise Hatori has spent her childhood being passed unwanted from relative to relative, 
until she finally makes her unfortunate way to a strange and improbable auction block.

Offered as a “Slay Vega” to the highest bidder, Chise is purchased by the (literally) boneheaded Elias Ainsworth, 
who promises to take her on as his apprentice.

Elias is a mage, and his world is one of dragons and faeries - but before Chise can begin to get accustomed to all of this, 
Elias drops another bombshell. Apparently Chise isn't just intended to be his apprentice - she will also be his bride.
description.es: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.ja: 少女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使い――……。羽鳥チセ15歳。身寄りもなく、生きる希望も術も持たぬ彼女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使いだった……。
description.es-la: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...

title.ja-ro: Tensei Kyuuketsuki-san wa Ohirune ga Shitai

altTitles.en: A Transmigration Vampire would like to take a Nap

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kyuuketsukisan wa Ohirune ga Shitai

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Vampire Wants an Afternoon Nap

altTitles.ja: 転生吸血鬼さんはお昼寝がしたい

description.en:
A polite and lethargic boy was reincarnated in another world as a vampire bishoujo. In this world of swords and magic, this protagonist who was reborn replete with all kinds of cheat powers was searching for one thing??!

"Three meals a day, snacks and an afternoon nap, I guess."

Are you really the protagonist!? And thus begins the fantasy comedy of a vampire looking for the ideal moocher lifestyle.

Kyoko (21) and Jiro (23) live together in Tokyo without being married. 
She is a graphist in an advertisement agency, he's starting to be an illustrator. 
We follow them through their love struggles and daily life with friends and family 
in a world where sexual revolution is about to start.

A new coming-of-age series from from Liberum, whom you might know for Soushi Souai.

Friends, lovers, fashion and hanging out after-school...
For Hoshino Ouka, a gal who grew up in the city those are important things. But when she unexpectedly had to move to the country side town 'Yutakamachi', everything she hold dear vanishes...? In an unfamiliar town the fresh and tender days of youth begin!

A world of war that has lasted for 100 years.
Fuugo and Roka, childhood friends of the Kingdom of Asdorm.
When the fates of two people who were once separated are reunited, a new threat that has never been seen before strikes them!

Einstein, Edison ...
Genius greats who have been reincarnated in a war-torn other world compete with all their best intellect, the Five Kingdoms War begins! !!

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！

title.en: Henkyou no Yakushi, Miyako de S Rank Boukensha to naru

altTitles.en: The Healer Ditches the Boonies to Become an S-Rank Adventurer: The Boy from the Hero’s Village Doesn’t Know His Cheat Medicine Is Unrivaled

altTitles.ja: 辺境の薬師、都でＳランク冒険者となる～英雄村の少年がチート薬で無自覚無双～

description.en: Leaf has been enjoying a peaceful life in his village at the farthest end of the country, but everything gets turned upside down when his fiancée betrays him, robbing him of his home, work, and everything he cherishes. Wandering around, lost on what to do next, he encounters a distinguished lady in peril who will change his life forever! Using the cheat-like power of medicine and drugs the world scoffs at, Leaf now begins his journey to become the almighty healer! "
description.id: Leaf telah menikmati kehidupan yang damai di desanya di ujung terjauh negara itu, tetapi segalanya menjadi terbalik ketika tunangannya mengkhianatinya, merampok rumah, pekerjaan, dan semua yang dia hargai. Berkeliaran, bingung apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya, dia bertemu dengan seorang wanita terkemuka dalam bahaya yang akan mengubah hidupnya selamanya! Menggunakan kekuatan pengobatan dan obat-obatan yang dicemooh dunia, Leaf kini memulai perjalanannya untuk menjadi penyembuh yang maha kuasa! "
description.ja:
田舎者の少年・リーフが最強の“調薬”スキルで成り上がる！　人生を変える出会いが都会にはいっぱい！！　無自覚無双な痛快“調薬”ファンタジーがここに開幕！！

最強の“調薬”スキルで成り上がれ！！　田舎に住む少年・リーフは、ある日許嫁に裏切られ、すべてを失ってしまう。しかし、大貴族のお嬢様・プリシラと出会ったことでリーフの人生は激変！　「薬を作れるだけなはず」の少年が、世界最強の冒険者になっていく！！

description.en:
What level of pain can you tolerate? Is it 1? Or is it 6? Let’s go to the theme park of pain…

A collection of painful events that people have experienced sorted in the “Pain Level Scale”, from 1 to 6.

altTitles.ja: 魔王令嬢の執行者―異世界執事は仰せのままに―

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou Reijou no Shikousha: Isekai Shitsuji wa Ouse no Mama ni

altTitles.en: The Executioner of the Demon King's Daughter
The Executioner of the Demon King's Daughter: The Otherworldly Butler Does as He Pleases

description.en:
From now on, you will become the butler of the Demon King’s Castle and live for me!

Lute, a young boy who was summoned to another world, but was abandoned due to his incompetence. The one who took his hand was the Demon King’s only daughter, Lurunoa. That encounter turns everything upside down. Three demon princesses with great hidden powers and secrets. When the mysteries of the continent are revealed, the boy becomes the world’s trump card!!

title.en: Maronie Oukoku no Shichinin no Kishi

altTitles.ja-ro: Marronnier Oukoku no Shichinin no Kishi

altTitles.en: The Seven Knights of the Marronnier Kingdom

altTitles.ja: マロニエ王国の七人の騎士

description.en:
A tale of seven knights that swear loyalty to a princess.  
  
---
**Notes:**
- Ranked #1 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! 2018 (Female readers)

Hilarious manhua (Taiwanese manga) about a girl to whom money means everything.  
  
Dahasu Zuhn's father has just gotten into debt and now his son, Dahasu Zuhn, is in poverty. He meets a girl called Amei Jin who's super strong and has a reason to get money. Dahasu also attends the High School, Freedom High School where he can get in for free. He meets Jin at the school and learns that she needs money for a special reason. Now he is her slave because he owes her 20,000 yen. Whatever shall Zuhn do?
description.it: Avete 17 anni, fate parte di una famiglia ricca e avete tutto quello che volete, cellulari, carte di credito, auto, donne e tutti i maschi della vostra (costosissima) scuola vi invidiano. Cosa può succedere di male? Bhè, vostro padre viene imprigionato per frode e non vi lascia nemmeno un soldo, la vostra matrigna scappa all'estero con un altro uomo appena viene a sapere dell'accaduto, la servitù ruba tutti i vostri averi preziosi che avete in casa, nessuno dei vostri parenti vi vuole adottare per i debiti della vostra famiglia e vi ritrovate a donare sangue per avere del cibo, venite espulsi dalla vostra scuola e finite nella peggior scuola del paese dove si rischia la vita ogni giorno, non solo, ma diventate anche lo schiavetto della ragazza più terrificante e violenta che si sia mai vista! Questa è la situazione in cui si trova Dahsau Zuhn, scoprite come se la caverà!

title.en: I Became the Sultan's Precious Cat

description.en:
After my sudden death, I was reincarnated in a strange world with a sultan and his harem, but not as a person, but as a kitten who can't talk!

I can only become human by kissing a prince who is worthy of the sultan...

After mistaking me for an assassin and treating me coldly, Prince Soliman says, "......It's soft, it's warm, can we stay here for a while?" as he approached me.

Prince Theron, who I thought was a sweetheart, seduces me by whispering, "Choose me over my brother, and I will give you everything you want." "I will give you everything you want," he whispered, seducing me.

I can't stay human unless I kiss one of them. "Nyaaong!" (Headache!)
How do I survive in this royal palace?
description.ko:
갑작스러운 죽음 이후, 술탄과 하렘이 있는 묘한 세계에 환생했다.
하필이면 사람도 아닌 말 못 하는 아기 고양이로!
 
오직 술탄의 자격이 있는 왕자와 입을 맞춰야 인간으로 변할 수 있다는데…
 
나를 암살자로 착각하고 차갑게 대하던 슐레이만 왕자는
“……부드럽고, 따뜻해. 잠깐 이렇게 있어도 될까?” 라며 내게 다가오고.
 
다정한 줄만 알았던 테론 왕자는,
“형님 말고 저를 선택하세요. 당신이 원하는 모든 걸 바치겠습니다.” 라고 속삭이며 나를 유혹한다.
 
둘 중 하나와 키스하지 않으면 인간의 모습을 유지할 수 없는 나.
“냐아오옹!”(머리 아파!)
이 왕궁에서 살아남으려면 어떻게 해야 하지?

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.en: Roxana: The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother
The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother
How to Protect the Heroine's Older Brother

altTitles.vi: Cách để bảo vệ anh trai của Nữ chính

altTitles.es: Cómo proteger al hermano mayor de la heroína

altTitles.ru: Как защитить старшего брата главной героини

altTitles.fa: راهی برای نجات برادر بزرگ‌ترِ شخصیت اولِ زن

altTitles.ja: ロクサナ〜悪女がヒロインの兄を守る方法〜

altTitles.zh: 保护女主角哥哥的方法

altTitles.zh-hk: 保護女主角哥哥的方法

description.en:
Kidnapping, murder, and risqué relationships! Within the scandalous pages of *The Abysmal Flower*, the downfall of Roxana Agrece's criminal family is already foretold. So when Cassis Pedelian, the heroine’s older brother, is kidnapped by Roxana's father, she can either wait for the heroine's revenge... or take matters into her own hands, since Cassis is the key to her survival. But with deceitful characters on all sides, can Roxana and Cassis trust each other enough to bring down the brutal Agreces?

---
I accidentally took possession of someone in a 19+ reverse harem novel.

The problem is that I became Roxanna Agriche, the older sister of the sub-villain. My damn father kidnapped the heroine's brother. Now, is the only thing left to meet a terrible end from the vengeance of the heroine?

But what if I can avoid that horrible development?

“I'm also interested in this toy.”

"I'll protect you until you can get out of here safely."

The heroine's brother, Cassis Pedalian, will definitely be able to pay me back later.

---

**Note:** Please be advised. This work contains somewhat sadistic expressions and portrayals of bloodshed due to the nature of the genre. There are images that may make you feel a little uncomfortable, so please take note. Additionally, this is **not** smut; it's just R15.

**Links:**
- [Official Indonesian/Bahasa Indonesia Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
- [Official Japanese/日本語 Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.fr:
Enlèvements, meurtres, et relations risquées! Dans les pages scandaleuses de *La fleur abyssale*, la chute de la famille criminelle de Roxana Agrece est déjà annoncée. Ainsi, lorsque Cassis Pedelian, le frère aîné de l'héroïne, est kidnappé par le père de Roxana, elle peut soit attendre la vengeance de l'héroïne... soit prendre les choses en main, puisque Cassis est la clé de sa survie. Mais avec des personnages trompeurs de tous les côtés, Roxana et Cassis peuvent-ils se faire suffisamment confiance pour faire tomber les brutales Agrece?

---
Traductions officielles:
* [Anglais / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Indonésien / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Japonais / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.id:
Aku tidak sengaja merasuki seseorang dalam novel harem terbalik 19+.  Masalahnya adalah aku menjadi Roxana Agriche, kakak dari sub-penjahat itu. Ayahku menculik saudara pemeran utama wanita itu. Sekarang, apakah satu-satunya hal yang tersisa untuk menemui akhir yang mengerikan dari pembalasan pemeran utama wanita? Tetapi bagaimana jika aku dapat menghindari perkembangan yang mengerikan itu?  “Aku juga tertarik dengan mainan ini.”  "Aku akan melindungimu sampai kamu bisa keluar dari sini dengan selamat."

---
Official Translations:
* [Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Bahasa Inggris / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Bahasa Jepang / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.it:
Accidentalmente mi sono reincarnata in un personaggio in un romanzo di harem inverso per maggiorenni. Il problema è che sono diventata Roxana Agriche, la sorella maggiore del cattivo. Il mio dannato padre ha poi rapito il fratello dell'eroina. Ora cosa ci rimane per incontrare una fine terribile e la vendetta dell'eroina? Ma cosa dovrei fare per evitare quest'orribile sviluppo? "Anche io sono interessata a questo giocattolo." "Ti proteggerò, finché non potrai uscire di qui sano e salvo." Il fratello dell'eroina, Cassis Fedelian, potrà sicuramente ripagarmi più tardi.

---
Official Translations:
* [Giapponese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
* [Indonesiano / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Inglese / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
description.ja:
どういう訳か小説の中の悪の一族、アグリチェ一家の娘「ロクサナ」に生まれ変わっていた！ アグリチェは人殺しをものともしない残虐非道な一族で、ロクサナもまたその一族の一人。 そして物語は、ロクサナの父「ラント」がある男を拉致してきた場面から始まる。 その拉致されてきた男は、アグリチェ一族とは対極のぺデリアン一族のプリンス「カシス」だった。 アグリチェ一族の誰もがカシスを殺そうとする中、ロクサナだけは唯一家族を騙してでも必死に救おうとする。 最初はロクサナを警戒していたカシスも徐々に心を開き始め…。

---
Official Translations:
* [日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
* [英語 / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [インドネシア語 / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
description.ko:
어쩌다 보니 19금 역하렘 소설에 빙의했다.

문제는 내가 악역 서브남의 누나가 되었다는 건데... 망할 아버지가 기어이 여자 주인공의 오빠를 납치해 왔다. 이제 여주인공의 가문에 복수 당해 몰락할 일만 남은 건가. 아아, 데드 플래그 피하기 진짜 힘들다.

"이번 장난감에는 저도 흥미가 있어요."

오빠, 이렇게 된 이상 내가 지켜줄게요.

그러니까 이 은혜는 나중에 꼭 갚아요, 알았죠?

---
Official Translations:
* [영어 / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [인도네시아어 / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [일본어 / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.ru:
Я переродилась в новелле 19+ с реверс-гаремом.

Проблема в том, что я стала старшей сестрой второго, злого главного героя… Мой чертов отец в конце концов похитил старшего брата главной героини. Теперь осталось только дожидаться мести от главной героини и разрушения рода? Ах, избежать смертельной концовки и правда тяжело.

"Я тоже заинтересована в этой игрушке."

Раз уж так вышло, то я тебя защищу. Поэтому обязательно отплати мне той же монетой, понял?

---
Official Translations:
* [Английский / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Индонезийский / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Японский / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.tr:
Bir 19+ ters harem romanının içine girdim.

Sorun şu ki, kötü adamın ablası Roxana Agriche oldum. Lanet babam, kahramanın kardeşini kaçırdı. Şimdi, kahramanın intikamından dolayı korkunç bir sonla karşılaşmak geriye kalan tek şey mi?

Ama ya bu korkunç gelişmeden kaçınırsam?

“Buradan sağ salim çıkana kadar seni koruyacağım.”

Kahramanın kardeşi Cassis Pedalian kesinlikle onun için yaptıklarımı daha sonra geri ödeyecek.

---
Official Translations:
* [Endonezce / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [İngilizce / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Japonca / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
description.pt-br:
Eu acidentalmente possui alguém em uma novel de harém reverso +19.
O problema é que eu me tornei Roxana Agriche, a irmã mais nova do sub-vilão. Meu maldito pai sequestrou o irmão da heroína.
Agora, a única coisa que me resta é encontrar um final terrível da vingança da heroína?
Mas e se eu puder evitar esse acontecimento?
“Eu também estou interessada nesse brinquedo.”
“Eu vou protegê-lo até que possa sair daqui a salvo.”
O irmão da heroína, Cassis Pedalian, vai definitivamente conseguir me retribuir depois.

---
Official Translations:
* [Inglês / English](https://tapas.io/series/roxana/info)
* [Indonésio / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
* [Japonês / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55153) (Compiled with [Elf ga Gendai ni Itara (Anthology)](https://mangadex.org/title/1ecd7a5f-5854-4b40-9c1a-c5588f9e4c71/if-elves-existed-in-the-present-day))
- Defunct Official Raw - [Twitter Moment](https://twitter.com/i/events/1490269318818713602)

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth! The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety! The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…? Find out in the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome.*
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

description.en:
The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School, but their name lets on much more, as they are being influenced by strange occult forces.
Dan Hayato, a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past, arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body, what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?
description.ja: 帝高校夜間部のアイドル、氷河めぐみが、謎の老婆ミス・ヴァージン率いる黒門高校によって拉致された！彼女を救うために教師が招いたのは、檀隼人という謎の転校生。めぐみ奪還に動き出す隼人だったが、その役目は我らにこそあり、と帝高護衛団「烈鬼」も動き出す。果たして彼女を救いだすのは――？

description.en: Ever since he injured his hand and had to quit playing piano, Yanagawa has had no motivation. Then one day he receives a suspicious cigarette from a girl he knows. A collection of short stories.

altTitles.pt-br: A reviravolta que mudou minha vida

description.en:
"Did I hit a man?"
With a mayor father, and one foot in Hankuk University, high school student Jo Soo-Ah is living the high life. One mistake leads to a hit-and-run. "It's okay because no one saw it", she thinks. But her life is slowly cracking down when the messages of M, an eyewitness who seemed to know everything, flying towards her.
description.pt-br: "Eu atropelei alguém?" O pai é um empresário proeminente, formado na Universidade da Coreia! Jo Soo-Ah, uma estudante do ensino médio com currículo exemplar! Com apenas um erro, ela se envolve em um acidente de atropelamento. Mas está tudo bem. Ninguém viu. No entanto, uma mensagem de M. chega até ela, perguntando: "?" "Quem é você?" "!" Uma testemunha. A aparição de uma testemunha que sabe de tudo. A perfeição de sua vida cotidiana começa a desmoronar!

altTitles.en: Sexy and Stupid Water Polo Comedy

description.en: Hamaji Youhei, a freshman in high school, lives his life aimlessly, lazing around all day. He can't keep up with his studies, no good at sports and won't stick with anything for long. Besides that he's a pervert who's continuously rejected by girls. A sophomore convinces him into joining a club where he could lunge at girls, fondling and touching all he wanted. Thus he joined the Water Polo Club. Can Youhei, who never sticks with anything for long, find his place in this club?
description.pt:
Hamaji Youhei, é um calouro do colegial, uma vida sem rumo, sem fazer nada o dia todo. Ele não é bom nos estudos, nos esportes e não dura muito tempo em lugar nenhum. alem disso ele é um pervertido que está continuamente sendo rejeitados pelas garotas. um colegial do 2º ano convence ele a entrar em um clube onde pudesse agarrar as garotas, acariciando e tocando tudo o que ele quiser. Assim, ele se juntou ao Clube de Polo Aquático. Pode Youhei, que nunca dura em lugar nenhum por muito tempo, encontrar seu lugar nesse clube?  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/K_hiyokopiyo)

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?

A girl wakes up in a school filled with human-cryptid hybrids. She doesn't know who she is, why she is there, and what's happening.


---

Project Melody streams on [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/projektmelody) while writing the script. The [streams](https://youtu.be/G0iyDcW9nyo) can be found in Projekt Melody's official [VOD archive](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBDQTYsCOjLZ-Sc7Unbt7rg).

altTitles.es-la: La Hermana con una fuerza brutal (R-18)

altTitles.pt-br: A irmã que excela força física (R-18)

description.en: Fanbox extras for [Chikarawaza no Sister](https://mangadex.org/title/3c025255-1151-4da4-9724-c28aa70e5062/chikarawaza-no-sister).

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
The cute Kyuu-chan is a wonder cat. Dance, sing, be happy together!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

description.en:
After a five year hiatus, the beloved Touhou doujin series by Shigeru Koyama continues, in which we follow the slice of life adventures of the Eientei family and their neighbors in the nostalgic and contemporary town of Gensouchou.
  
English translation also available on Danbooru: <https://danbooru.donmai.us/pools/1368>

title.en: Sousou no Frieren - Gaku Paro na Shutaferu (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン - 学パロなシュタフェル

altTitles.en: Frieren at the Funeral - Stark X Fern: School AU
Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End - Stark X Fern: School AU

description.en:
**Notes:**
- The author skipped chapter 2.

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

Out of fear, Arshe kills her brother who would have become the king, and gets imprisoned inside the palace. Later, a prince comes from the Empire and gives her a secret offer. 

Arshe, who has always wished to live a stable life, is told by her brother that there was a marriage proposal from a neighboring country. When she’s forced to be sent there, she gets frustrated, worrying that she might get killed in a foreign land. After poisoning her brother to death, Arshe is locked up inside the palace. Then one day, a prince comes from the Empire to visit her. 

---
During a chance meeting, Princess Asché shares an unforgettable kiss with Ethan, the second prince of a nearby empire. Years later, Asché’s brother arranges a marriage that will force her to become the Emperor’s ninth wife. Rather than suffer in a loveless union, Asché poisons her brother, and is imprisoned in the palace for her crime. But as revolution stirs, Ethan, now an anti-imperial rebel, suddenly reappears in her bedroom, and a steamy romance fraught with political implications begins.
description.id:
Ashé, yang mengharapkan kehidupan yang stabil terpaksa ke negara lain setelah kakaknya mendapat tawaran pernikahan. Karena takut mati dengan cara yang mengerikan jika dia melakukan pernikahan yang tidak diinginkan, dia akhirnya meracuni saudaranya sendiri. Suatu hari, setelah dipenjara di istana karena kejahatan itu, pangeran kekaisaran datang untuk menemukannya.

---
Sebagai putri kerajaan yang dilahirkan oleh dayang istana, Ashe begitu mendambakan kebebasan. Namun sayangnya, William, kakak sekaligus pangeran pertama yang haus akan takhta justru menjodohkannya dengan kaisar yang terkenal ringan tangan. Ashe yang menolak perjodohan tersebut pun meracuni William hingga tewas. Tetapi, akankah kematian William menjadi titik terang bagi Ashe? Atau hidupnya justru menjadi semakin rumit setelah Ashe menjalin hubungan dengan pira yang dia pilih, yaitu Idan anak sang Kaisar?
description.ja: アメタン王国の王女アーシャは第一王子のウィリアムに王位を継承させ、王国を出て平穏な生活を送ることを望んでいた。 しかし、兄ウィリアムから皇帝の妃になることを強要されそうにー。 アーシェは兄を毒殺するも、その罪で監禁され、5年後に死刑となることを宣告される。 そんな中、前に帝国のパーティで偶然に出会い、忘れられない時を過ごした皇子イダンが訪れてきて…。
description.ko:
왕위 쟁탈전에는 관심이 없는 왕녀 아셰는 연회에서 우연히 제국의 2황자 이단을 만나게 된다. 비밀 장소에서 만난 그들은 왠지 모를 친근감에 속마음을 터놓게 되고, 술김에 첫키스까지 하게 된다.

7년 후, 태자인 친오라비를 죽이고 궁에 감금되어 처벌을 기다리는 아셰 앞에 또다시 이단이 찾아온다...

description.en: The beautiful English teacher Momoko Irosaki receives what she thinks are the lustful gazes of her male students every day... or so she misunderstands!? What goes on in the school life of a teacher who inadvertently indulges in fantasies full of allure...?
description.ja: 美人英語教師の色咲先生は、日々男子生徒から思春期真っ盛りの視線を浴びている…のは勘違い!? ついお色気全開の妄想をしてしまう先生の学校生活は――…。ちょっとえっちでかなり笑える妄想スクールコメディ!!

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.
A whole new THE iDOLM@STER branch - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. This comic introduces about characters and stuff in Hatsuboshi Academy.
description.vi: Một nhánh THE iDOLM@STER hoàn toàn mới - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. Truyện giới thiệu về các nhân vật và những điều liên quan đến Học viện tư lập Hatsuboshi.

altTitles.ja: きみはかわいいれぷたいる

description.en:
Itsuki Fukunaga (27) is the manager of a reptile store. Surrounded by his favorite reptiles, he spent every day happily. But one day, Fuu-chan, a bearded lizard with a chin turned into a human girl. Her personality and gestures are the same as when she was a reptile. 

A exciting love comedy with 120% reptile geekiness and 120% lovey-dovey!

On that day, I met my destiny.
Kashiko Hinata, an office worker who has never been in love, meets Reika, a beautiful girl with an unknown identity, who says, "I'll do anything, please let me stay here!"

Their shared life together begins. A yuri tale of love and madness, told with beautiful brush strokes, is about to begin!

title.en: Guide to Raising a Loyal Dog

description.en: A reward notice for a “lost dog” ties the fates of Ling Xiangwan and Bai Qingxiao together. As the poor university student, Ling Xiangwan, searches for the owner of the dog he is currently carrying, he accidentally catches glimpses of Bai Qingxiao’s naughty deeds. It is only then that he realizes this is not the kind of “dog” the notice was looking for. As the door to flee the scene is quite literally shut, Bai Qingxiao asks Ling Xiangwan to pay him company, how humiliating! Ling Xiangwan leaves, fuming. After that, Bai Qingxiao just can’t seem to get Ling Xiangwan out of his mind…

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

title.en: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner

description.en:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

altTitles.zh-ro: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye

altTitles.en: Night of Love and Murderous Intent

description.en: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and he’s coming after the beta with a powerful intent—

altTitles.ja: ゆらめく秋の恋ごころ

description.en:
I want you to hold me just once… I promise I won’t tell you I love you.

— Igarashi, a photographer, is friends with benefits with Shida, a popular stylist who only ever touches him when he’s drunk. —

The truth is, I’ve had an unrequited love for Shida ever since high school...but I'd rather settle for holding him in my arms than confessing my feelings and not be able to be by his side anymore. Yet, Shida always carelessly whispers things like "I love you" and "you’re cute...”

From the popular series “Love Blooms for a Twisted Blossom" and "A Sigh In Spring, A Love In Summer” is the long awaited spin-off that shows the true essence of unrequited love between a creative stylist and a troubled, kuudere photographer.

description.ar: في المستقبل البعيد ، يولد شكل جديد من أشكال الحياة يسمى Houseki (الجواهر). يجب على الجواهر الـ 28  القتال ضد القمريين الذين يرغبون في مهاجمتهم وتحويلهم إلى زينة ، وبالتالي يتم تعيين كل جوهرة دور مثل مقاتل أو مسعف. على الرغم من أنهم يأملون في محاربة القمريين ، إلا أن فوس  عبارة عن جوهرة لم يتم منحها أي مهمة حتى يطلب منه المعلم الجواهر كونغو كتابة موسوعة.
description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called The Lustrous are born. The 28 Lustrous must fight against the Lunarians who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each Lustrous is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the Lunarians, Phos is a Lustrous who is given no assignment until the Lustrous' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.
description.uk: У далекому майбутньому народжується нова форма життя, яку називають самоцвітами. 28 самоцвітів повинні боротися проти лунаріанців, які хочуть напасти на них і перетворити на прикраси, тому кожному самоцвіту призначена роль бійця або медика. Фос - одна з самоцвітів, яка сподівається боротися з лунаріанцями, але їй не дають жодних завдань, доки майстер самоцвітів Адамантін не просить її написати енциклопедію.

title.en: No Way I'll Go into the Cornfield With You!

description.en:
Jiang Lieyang, a spoiled rich kid  who was born in the Jiangnan region, was deceived by his own mother and sent to the Dongbei countryside. Where the mysterious local resident Xun Zao became Jiang Lieyang’s “acting guardian”

Not being used to the living habits and the difference in local customs make the pampered Jiang Lieyang want to escape, but he couldn't help but getting closer and closer to Xun Zao...

altTitles.ja: ぼくと仁義なきおじさん

description.en:
The long-awaited new work of Momose Wataru, the author of the highly acclaimed anime "Romantic Killer" which is currently airing on Netflix! The story follows Yuuhi, an elementary school student who is home-sitting alone every day. One day, all of a sudden, his neighbor, Mr. Aoi, who lives upstairs, falls in his room leaving a hole in the ceiling. Yuuhi finds out that his neighbor is a cool looking man with a secret side he doesn’t want anyone to know. What does he want to hide so badly? The comedy about a good-looking gangster and a kind-hearted boy and their secret is ready to start!

(Source: MANGA Plus)

Entertainment writer Lee Seul, heard the news of her favorite idol, Block Shoot's Seung-Chan, on her new entertainment program.
Expectations of meeting her favorite for more than 10 years are brief, and she accidentally sees her favorite idol kissing someone else in secret at the broadcasting station.
In addition, the entertainment program she was in charge of is a love variety program that’s full of dating amongst the cast...
She has to watch her favorite idol flirting and dating someone else even if he's her favorite.

title.en: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?

altTitles.id: Aku, Seorang Raja Iblis, Mengambil Budak Elf Sebagai Istriku, Tapi Bagaimana Cara Aku Mencintainya?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

altTitles.pt: Eu, um Lorde Demônio, comprei uma elfa escrava como minha esposa, mas como eu amo ela?

altTitles.en: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

altTitles.fr: Je, un seigneur des démons, ai épousé un elfe esclavagisant, mais comment l'aime-je?

altTitles.ru: Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку в жёны. И как прикажете её любить?
Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку-рабыню в жёны. И как же мне её любить?

altTitles.zh: 我这魔王娶了一个奴隶精灵当老婆，该怎么疼爱才好？

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.
description.pt-br: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

description.en: A parting with one mom and a meeting with another. Our close and distant parting story.
description.fr:
"Cœur de pierre."
C'était ce que Lee Eunyoung avait toujours l'habitude d'utiliser pour décrire sa mère. Mais après le décès de sa mère, Eunyoung découvre un journal qui montre des choses qu'elle ne savait même pas au sujet de la femme qui l'a élevée. La lecture de ces écrits permet à Eunyoung de continuer à sentir la présence de sa mère et résoudre leur relation compliquée, mais à mesure que les pages restantes diminuent et que les visions qui lui tenaient compagnie commencent à s'estomper, elle est forcée de faire face à sa nouvelle réalité et de faire ses derniers adieux.

title.en: A Story about a Former Delinquent Girl Who Is Proposed to by a Yandere Man Whom She Got into a Fight with in the Past

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Yan Onna ga Mukashi Kenkashita Yandere Otoko ni Kyuukon sareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 元ヤン女が昔喧嘩したヤンデレ男に求婚される話

altTitles.fr: Une ex-délinquante demandée en mariage par un yandere avec qui elle s'est battue par le passé
